subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Blake Wheeler and David Krejci set up each other for scores 10 seconds apart in a five-goal third period Friday to help the Bruins to their 10th victory in 12 games.
snippet: Blake Wheeler and David Krejci set up each other for scores 10 seconds apart in a five-goal third period Friday to help the Bruins to their 10th victory in 12 games.
